mapper.select:
select count(*) from BI_SOLUTION SOLUTION, BI_EMP EMP, BI_CATEGORY CATE where SOLUTION.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID and SOLUTION.SOLUTION_CATE = CATE.CATE_NO and CATE.CATE_SECTION_NAME = #{categoryName}
and SOLUTION.SOLUTION_TITLE like '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
and EMP.EMP_NAME like '%' || #{ID} || '%'
order by SOLUTION_NO desc

select SOLUTION_NO as NO, EMP_NAME, CATE_SECTION_NAME, SOLUTION_TITLE as TITLE, SOLUTION_CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, SOLUTION_CONTENT as CONTENT, SOLUTION_FLAG as FLAG, SOLUTION_UPDATER as UPDATER, SOLUTION_UPDATE_DATE as UPDATE_DATE from ( select SOLUTION.SOLUTION_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, CATE.CATE_SECTION_NAME, SOLUTION.EMP_ID, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_CATE, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_TITLE, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_CREATE_DATE, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_CONTENT, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_FLAG, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_UPDATER, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_UPDATE_DATE, row_number() over (order by SOLUTION_NO desc) rn from BI_SOLUTION SOLUTION, BI_EMP EMP, BI_CATEGORY CATE where SOLUTION.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID and SOLUTION.SOLUTION_CATE = CATE.CATE_NO
and SOLUTION.SOLUTION_TITLE like '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
and EMP.EMP_NAME like '%' || #{ID} || '%'
) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn <= #{endIndex} and SOLUTION_FLAG = 'Y' and CATE_SECTION_NAME = #{categoryName} order by SOLUTION_NO desc

SELECT BI_SOLUTION_SEQ.currval FROM DUAL
insert into BI_SOLUTION (SOLUTION_NO,EMP_ID,SOLUTION_CATE,SOLUTION_TITLE,SOLUTION_CREATE_DATE,SOLUTION_CONTENT,SOLUTION_FLAG,SOLUTION_UPDATER,SOLUTION_UPDATE_DATE) values (BI_SOLUTION_SEQ.nextval, #{EMP_ID}, #{CATE}, #{TITLE}, sysdate, #{CONTENT},'Y',NULL,NULL)
mapper.select: select SOLUTION.SOLUTION_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, SOLUTION.EMP_ID, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_TITLE, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_CREATE_DATE, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_CONTENT, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_FLAG, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_UPDATER, SOLUTION.SOLUTION_UPDATE_DATE from BI_SOLUTION SOLUTION, BI_EMP EMP where SOLUTION.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID and SOLUTION.SOLUTION_NO = #{value}
select FILE_NO as NO, SOLUTION_NO, EMP_ID, FILE_DUAL as DUAL, FILE_NAME as NAME, FILE_FLAG as FLAG from BI_SOLUTION_FILE where SOLUTION_NO = #{value} and FILE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.delete: update BI_SOLUTION set SOLUTION_FLAG = 'N' where SOLUTION_NO = #{value}
mapper.update: update BI_SOLUTION set SOLUTION_TITLE = #{TITLE}, SOLUTION_CONTENT = #{CONTENT}, SOLUTION_UPDATER = #{UPDATER}, SOLUTION_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE where SOLUTION_NO = #{NO}

SELECT REP_SOLUTION_SEQ.currval FROM DUAL

mapper.select: select REPLY.REPLY_NO as NO, REPLY.SOLUTION_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, REPLY.REPLY_CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, REPLY.REPLY_CONTENT as CONTENT from BI_SOLUTION_REPLY REPLY,BI_EMP EMP where SOLUTION_NO = #{value} and REPLY.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID order by CREATE_DATE desc
